messages.subject: silly "wheel of dreaded consequences"
messages.msgSnippet: -=-No longer will you have to rack your brain trying to think up appropriate consequences.-=- Weird. But not as bad as some parenting plans! The name of one of
messages.messageBody:
-=-No longer will you have to rack your brain trying to think up appropriate
consequences.-=-

Weird.

But not as bad as some parenting plans!

The name of one of the pages was "Control Your kids' behavior, yet stay
friends"

The pre-made themes were:
Excessive Arguing
Leaving the Lights On
Not Putting Things Away
A Job Poorly Done
S-t-r-e-t-c-h-i-n-g the Truth
Taking Without Asking
Talking Back

For a family in which it IS hard for the parents to get any ideas, where
their goal is controlling their kids, it's more innocuous than most things I've
seen.

Unschooling seems SO much easier to me! (And $15 cheaper <bwg>)

Sandra
